text: Yes, that's one mitchell mentioned. I tested.
I opened a new PR to fix the bug of posting an unknown message. Reviews of anyone are welcome. <https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/pull/32>

attachments.title: Fix the bug of posting unknown message by feihujiang · Pull Request #32 · hyperledger/sawtooth-core · GitHub
attachments.text: Signed-off-by: feihujiang <mailto:jiangfeihu@huawei.com|jiangfeihu@huawei.com> if error response or another error response returned, we need to return these messages immediately. And I add an integration test.
attachments.fallback: GitHub: Fix the bug of posting unknown message by feihujiang · Pull Request #32 · hyperledger/sawtooth-core
